data.title: Web Development Group
data.description: A group focused on modern web development technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Angular and React.

data.title: Mobile App Development
data.description: This group covers mobile application development for both iOS and Android platforms using various technologies and frameworks.

data.title: Data Science & Analytics
data.description: A comprehensive group covering data science, machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization techniques.

data.title: UI/UX Design
data.description: Focus on user interface and user experience design principles, tools, and best practices for creating engaging digital experiences.

data.title: Database Management
data.description: Covers database design, SQL, NoSQL databases, and database administration for various database management systems.
